title: Monsters of North Carolina: Mysterious Creatures in the Tar Heel State
features: Bizarre beasts of the Tar Heel State featured in this volume include Skunk Ape, Mystery Primates, Santers and Vampire Beasts, Monstrous Snakes, Giant Insects, Mermaids and Mermen, and Sea Serpents.
description: John Hairr lives in Lillington, North Carolina, and is the author of several books, including Great Hurricanes of North Carolina and Gold Mines of North Carolina.
